title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Peer Assessment Feedback Workshop for Critical Thinking Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze peers' mathematical problem-solving approaches and propose at least three specific improvements
Learners can provide structured feedback of at least 150 characters on peers' project deliverables based on the provided assessment rubric
Learners can revise their problem-solving strategies at least twice based on peer feedback and submit the final deliverable
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
